Details:
CONTEXT: Disney+ Ahsoka series launches Nov 15. Historical pattern shows +28% sales during Star Wars content releases. Current inventory: 45K units insufficient for predicted demand spike.

ACTION: Order 27K additional units: 75331 Mandalorian Starfighter (12K), 75341 Luke's Landspeeder (8K), 75355 X-Wing (7K).

FINANCIAL: Additional sales €4.2M, Inventory cost €1.8M, Net margin €2.4M, ROI 133%.

TIMING: Order by Nov 5, Production lead time 3 weeks, Arrival Nov 28, Sales window Dec 1-24.

RISK: 73% probability of stockout if no action. Competitor availability high.

Action: Lanzar promoción Friends en Europa Central
Details:
CONTEXT: Heartlake Hospital viral on TikTok (2.3M views). Demand spike +65% detected. Stock risk in Germany, Poland, Czech Republic.

ACTION: Flash 15% discount + free shipping for 14 days. Target demographics: Girls 6-12, Parents 30-45. Channels: Email, Instagram, TikTok ads.

FINANCIAL: Incremental sales €1.8M, Promo cost €450K, Marketing €280K, Net margin €1.07M, ROI 245%.

TIMING: Launch within 7 days to capture viral momentum. Campaign duration 14 days.

RISK: Viral trends decay rapidly. 84% confidence assumes action within 1 week.

CONTEXT: Brazil economic slowdown + currency devaluation. Price elasticity analysis shows -12% price → +34% volume in emerging markets.

ACTION: Tactical price reduction on 8 core City SKUs. Maintain premium positioning on complex sets. Test for 90 days.

FINANCIAL: Volume increase 34% (8.2K→11K units/month), Revenue +€950K, Margin compression offset by volume, Net +€420K, ROI 156%.

TIMING: Implement by Nov 10 to capture holiday season. Review after 90 days.

RISK: Potential brand dilution if prolonged. Monitor competitor response.

Action: Expandir línea Botanicals con 3 nuevos sets
Details:
CONTEXT: Fastest growing category +156% in 3 months. Pinterest searches +240%. Target: Adult women 25-45 (non-traditional LEGO buyers). Home decor trend.

ACTION: Develop 3 new sets: Orchid Garden (€89), Succulent Collection (€59), Bonsai Tree v2 (€69). Launch Q2 2025.

FINANCIAL: Development cost €850K, Marketing €420K, Projected sales €5.2M (Year 1), Net margin €3.5M, ROI 412%.

TIMING: Design phase 60 days, Production 90 days, Launch May 2025. Pre-orders March 2025.

RISK: Trend sustainability uncertain. Diversify designs to appeal to multiple aesthetics.

Action: Redistribuir inventario Creator desde Asia a Europa
Details:
CONTEXT: Asia-Pacific Creator sales -18% below forecast. Europe +22% above forecast. Inventory imbalance detected. Modular Buildings high demand in Europe.

ACTION: Ship 8.5K units from Singapore warehouse to Rotterdam. Focus on Architecture and Modular Buildings SKUs.

FINANCIAL: Logistics cost €240K, Avoided markdowns in Asia €320K, Incremental EU sales €680K, Net margin €680K, ROI 185%.

TIMING: Initiate shipment by Nov 8. Transit time 21 days. Arrival Nov 29 (pre-holiday).

RISK: Currency fluctuation exposure during transit. Hedge recommended.

CONTEXT: 'Premium Collectors' segment = 12% customers but 38% revenue. CLV €2,400. High retention value. Competitor programs emerging.

ACTION: Launch VIP tier: Early access to exclusives, Designer interviews, Flagship events, Personalized recommendations.

FINANCIAL: Program cost €180K/year (platform + events), Retention improvement +15%, Incremental revenue €1.52M, ROI 744%.

TIMING: Soft launch Jan 2025 (500 beta users). Full launch March 2025 (5K members).

RISK: Cannibalization of regular sales minimal (different purchase patterns). Exclusivity must be maintained.

CONTEXT: New Ninjago season launched. Legacy sets sales -78%. €3.1M inventory at risk of obsolescence. Holding cost €45K/month.

ACTION: Aggressive clearance: -40% discount + bundle with new season sets. Multi-channel: Online, outlet stores, B2B liquidators.

FINANCIAL: Recovery €1.85M (60% of inventory value), Loss mitigation €1.25M vs full write-off, Break-even on holding costs.

TIMING: Launch clearance Nov 10. Complete liquidation by Dec 25 (45 days). Avoid Q1 2025 write-off.

RISK: Brand perception if too aggressive. Position as 'collector's last chance' not 'clearance'.

CONTEXT: Marvel superhero sales growth deceleration -15% QoQ. Market saturation signals. STEM education trend +45% growth. Government education budgets increasing.

ACTION: Reduce Marvel SKUs 20% (eliminate low performers). Invest savings in STEM/Education line expansion. Target schools, parents.

FINANCIAL: Marvel revenue impact -€1.2M, STEM incremental +€4.0M, Net gain €2.8M, Investment €950K, ROI 198%.

TIMING: Phase 1 (Marvel reduction) Q1 2025. Phase 2 (STEM launch) Q2-Q3 2025. Full year impact.

RISK: Marvel still profitable. Don't over-correct. Monitor Disney content calendar for resurgence opportunities.
